class.name: Crypto
class.description: A class for cryptographic data encryption and decryption.

function.signature: void encrypt_decrypt(const String& p_data, String& p_result, const CryptoKey& p_key)
function.description: Encrypts or decrypts the input data using the provided cryptographic key.
function.param: The data to encrypt or decrypt.
The resulting encrypted or decrypted data.
The cryptographic key used for encryption or decryption.

function.signature: String encrypt_decrypt(const String& p_data, const CryptoKey& p_key)
function.description: Encrypts or decrypts the input data using the provided cryptographic key and returns the result.
function.param: The data to encrypt or decrypt.
The cryptographic key used for encryption or decryption.
function.returns: The resulting encrypted or decrypted data.
